mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CM_MATCH (ST_ID, KAKAO_ID, HEIGHT, BODY_SHAPE, DIVISION, PURPOSE, ORIFILENAME,NAME) VALUES (#{st_id}, #{kakao_id}, #{height}, #{body_shape}, #{division}, #{purpose},#{oriFilename},#{name})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CM_MATCH WHERE ST_ID = #{st_id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE CM_MATCH SET ST_ID = #{st_id}, KAKAO_id = #{kakao_id},
WHERE ST_ID = #{st_id}
